title: Agoda: B2B Product/Business Analyst (Remote/Hybrid)
desc: Responsible for domestic B2B business, interfacing with OTAs/Suppliers. Requires data analysis and product interfacing skills. Ideal for candidates with travel industry experience and SQL/Product skills.
requirements:
- Travel industry experience (distributors/partners)
- SQL capability / Product interfacing ability
- Experience as Solution Manager is a plus
- Strong analytical skills for resource analysis

title: Adyen: Implementation Specialist / Account Manager
desc: Global payment platform. Hiring for Implementation Specialist and Account Manager. Great WLB (22 days annual leave) and benefits. Role involves technical onboarding and strategic account management.
requirements:
- Implementation Specialist (Technical Onboarding)
- Account Manager (Strategic Growth)
- Problem solver & Strategic thinker
- English resume required
